articles.title: FIFA confirms intercontinental playoffs for World Cup spots to be one-off matches at neutral venues - ABC News
articles.description: If Australia has to go in the intercontinental playoffs for the World Cup finals in Qatar, they won't be able to clinch a spot in front of home fans or a hostile away crowd, with FIFA saying playoffs will be one-off games at neutral venues.
articles.content:
FIFA has confirmed the World Cup 2022 inter-confederation qualifying playoffs will be played as one-off matches at neutral venues.
